creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure with wreath on head, leaning against the inside of a large, upturned barrel, with an open book on the ground next to him; extending PL arm to crowd at R; noble figure R of C with elegant clothing, extending PR hand; guard holding a sword behind his own neck next to barrel; Gothic archway with open iron gate in background
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Alexander and Diogenes
